translation.en: Once upon a time, there was a little girl...
...just like any other little girl.
And like most little girls, she loved collecting beautiful things.

translation.es: -¿O no te gusta vivir sin ella? -¿Disculpa?

translation.en: -You're used to being the center of things. -As a matter of fact, I am.
translation.es: -Creo que te gusta ser el centro. -De hecho, lo soy.

translation.en: Naturally. Normally.
What you got going on is a whole lot of genetic limelight.
translation.es: Lo que tú tienes es una atracción genética.

translation.en: I think that you're acting really unreasonably right now.
translation.es: Creo que estás actuando muy irracionalmente en este momento.

translation.en: Why don't we step outside? Maybe calm down.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no salimos? Quizá eso te calme.

translation.en: I'm not counting to 10. I'm not writing up some itinerary.
translation.es: No, no voy a contar hasta diez ni voy a escribir un itinerario.

translation.en: Right here, now. Let's have this out.
And say something you wanna say, not what someone wrote for you.
translation.es: Y por una vez, di lo que quieres, no lo que te escribieron.

translation.en: Just be you, whoever that is.
translation.es: Sé tú misma, lo que sea.

translation.en: From a woman who'll kiss anyone with lips...
translation.es: ¿Lo dice una mujer que besa a todos...

translation.en: ...but saves abstinence for the one person she really cares about?
translation.es: ...pero se abstiene con el único que le interesa?

translation.en: At least I can admit I'm messed up.
translation.es: Al menos yo admito que tengo problemas.

translation.en: You're so desperate to make everybody like you...
...you let people use me to get to you.
translation.es: ...que dejas que la gente me use para llegar a ti.

translation.en: You let people use you regardless of whether I'm around, Mia.
translation.es: Tú dejas que la gente te use estando yo o no, Mia.

translation.en: You make that choice all of the time, so don't blame your genetically lit roommate.
translation.es: Tú eliges eso. No culpes a tu compañera genéticamente iluminada.

translation.en: And don't draw on my parents.
translation.es: Y no metas a mis padres.

translation.en: It's not nice.
Oh, my God.
You really shouldn't sleep in that position. It's bad for your neck.
translation.es: No deberías dormir en esa posición. Es malo para el cuello.

translation.en: I deserve it.
I'm the devil. See?
You are.
I wouldn't wanna be friends with me, either. Reduced security or not.
translation.es: Yo tampoco querría ser amiga mía, con seguridad reducida o no.

translation.en: We just have to face it. My life will never be normal.
translation.es: Debo aceptar que mi vida jamás será normal.

translation.en: And what exactly is so bad about that?
translation.es: ¿Y qué tiene de malo eso exactamente?

translation.en: The last time I had privacy, I was in utero.
translation.es: La última vez que tuve privacidad estaba en el útero.

translation.en: Imagine what it's like to have your whole life picked out for you.
translation.es: Imagínate tener toda tu vida decidida.

translation.en: Imagine never being alone and always feeling lonely.
translation.es: Imagínate no estar nunca solo y sentirte siempre solitario.

translation.en: All I ever wanted was to get my key, get in a beat-up little Volkswagen.
translation.es: Lo único que siempre quise fue subirme a un Volkswagen destartalado...

translation.en: and drive off to college.
You think I'm a silly, spoiled kid completely devoid of gratitude.
translation.es: Piensas que soy una niña malcriada desprovista de gratitud

translation.en: I think I completely understand what you're going through.
translation.es: En realidad, entiendo lo que tienes que soportar.

translation.en: You do?
This one time, I won the class spelling bee.
translation.es: Yo gané la competencia de ortografía...

translation.en: I couldn't get from point A to point B without people watching every move.
translation.es: ...y no podía ir a ningún lado sin que observaran cada movimiento mío.

translation.en: I had to avoid the press, the paparazzi....
translation.es: Tuve que evitar a la prensa, a los paparazzi...

translation.en: And the women. My God, the women, Sam.
translation.es: Y a las mujeres. ¡Dios mío, las mujeres, Sam!

translation.en: The training bras left in my locker could fill the support needs of an entire country.
translation.es: La cantidad de sostenes que dejaron en mi armario sostendría a todo un país.

translation.en: So, listen, about last night....
You're my RA.
It's forbidden. I get it.
-It's actually not just the RA thing. -The other thing.
translation.es: -No es solo lo de ser consejero. -La otra cosa.

translation.en: Most guys have to meet the dad. My dates have to charm the commander in chief.
translation.es: Muchos deben lidiar con conocer al papá. Mis citas lisonjean al comandante en jefe.

translation.en: Note to fathers worldwide:
translation.es: Nota a todos los padres del mundo:

translation.en: In order to keep your daughters from getting any action, become the president.
translation.es: Para evitar que sus hijas experimenten intimidad, conviértanse en el presidente.

translation.en: You were hoping to get some action?
You need some air? I think I could use a little air.
translation.es: ¿Necesitas aire? A mí me vendría bien un poco de aire.

translation.en: I'll just go get changed.
-I got your shoes. Let's go. -Thank you.
My dad used to take me to a spot like this.
translation.es: Mi papá solía traerme a un lugar como éste.

translation.en: He would always say that the world was a tough place...
translation.es: Siempre decía que el mundo era un lugar difícil...

translation.en: ...and that you needed total self-reliance to survive it.
translation.es: ...y que necesitas confiar en ti mismo para sobrevivir.

translation.en: He must be proud of you.
translation.es: Él debe de estar orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: If he was, he definitely wouldn't say so.
translation.es: Si lo está, definitivamente no lo demuestra.

translation.en: Let's say you do please your father...
translation.es: Digamos que complaces a tu padre...

translation.en: ...and you are completely successful and completely self-reliant...
translation.es: ...eres exitoso y confías completamente en ti mismo...

translation.en: ...and you know that he's proud of you.
translation.es: ...y sabes que él está orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: Then what?
It's tough to imagine, right?
Because then you'd have to actually figure out what you want.
translation.es: Entonces tendrías que decidir lo que tú quieres.

translation.en: You've thought about this before, huh?
Every day of my life.
You okay? Excuse me.
Let's go back in there. How do you do that?
What's that?
When I'm with you, I'm just me.
translation.es: Cuando estoy contigo soy simplemente yo.

translation.en: Not the first daughter.
-I really like it. -You're just....
So are you.
All right, then. Let's get back in there. You lead.
translation.es: Muy bien, entonces. Volvamos a entrar. Tú primero.

translation.en: -You beat me. -I kicked your butt.
Thanks. Usually, people let me win.
You will never have to worry about that with me.
Thank you.
Good.
Will you show me how you did that?
Excuse me. Go one more time. Just hers.
translation.es: Una vez más. Solo el de ella.

translation.en: -I like your bracelet. -Thanks. It's from my dad.
translation.es: -Me gusta tu brazalete. -Gracias. Me lo regaló mi papá.

translation.en: It's one charm for every continent, country and every election we won.
translation.es: Un dije por cada continente, país y elección que ganó.

translation.en: -It's for all of our trips together. -That's cool. Go ahead.
translation.es: -Por todos nuestros viajes juntos. -Es genial. Adelante.

translation.en: 60¢ TURN YOUR DIME INTO...
For your bracelet.
Just the first of all the trips you're gonna take on your own.
translation.es: Es solo el primero de todos los viajes que harás tú sola.

translation.en: Well, this is my stop.
That's your room.
I like it. It's nice.
Spacious for a double.
That's exactly what I said to Mia.
translation.es: Exactamente lo que le dije a Mia.

translation.en: -Well, I had fun. -I had fun.
All right. Well....
I guess I should....
-Me too. -Well, here.
Thank you for tonight.
Good night, Samantha.
Good night.
Good night.
Night.
I know you're mad at me right now, but I kissed him.
translation.es: Sé que estás enojada conmigo, pero lo besé.

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
-I'll just.... -No, Sam.
Stay.
-Really? -Yeah, really?
I really need to hang out with my roommate tonight.
translation.es: Tengo que estar con mi compañera esta noche.

translation.en: You should go.
I know I'm hard to live with.
translation.es: Sé que es difícil vivir conmigo.

translation.en: -I know you didn't wanna be my roommate. -Come with me.
translation.es: -Sé que no querías ser mi compañera. -Ven conmigo.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hi.
Oh, my God.
I can't believe it, it's you. You're here in my room.
translation.es: ¡No puedo creer que seas tú! ¡Estás aquí, en mi cuarto!

translation.en: Sam, allow me to introduce you to our dorm mate...
translation.es: Sam, ella es nuestra vecina de cuarto...

translation.en: ...Linda, of Paterson, New Jersey.
Plays trombone. My original roommate.
translation.es: Toca el trombón. Mi compañera original.

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
Don't move.
Yeah. Wow, right?
Linda practices four hours a day. In her room.
translation.es: Linda practica cuatro horas al día. En su cuarto.

translation.en: -Four. -Isn't that fantastic?
Bulletproof glass is looking pretty good right now.
translation.es: El vidrio blindado vendrá muy bien ahora.

translation.en: Yeah, it's looking great.
Are we good? Are we all set, Liz?
Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.
-Mia, I need you to come with me. -I knew you'd change your mind.
translation.es: -Mia, necesito que vengas conmigo. -Sabía que cambiarías de idea.

translation.en: Whatever you say.
-Anybody up for a study break? -Okay, what's going on?
Sam?
I'm kidnapping you.
Mr. Motormouth. What's up?
-Does he say anything? Ever? -Come on, Mia.
Please, follow me.
I can't believe I'm on Air Force One. Now this is a road trip.
translation.es: No puedo creer que esté en el Fuerza Aérea Uno. Este sí es un viaje.

translation.en: Well, you guys have put up with a lot from me and I wanted to do something special.
translation.es: Tuvieron que aguantarme muchas cosas y quería hacer algo especial.

translation.en: -And who might you be? -This is Charles.
He's here to assist you with anything you want.
translation.es: Te ayudará con cualquier cosa que quieras.

translation.en: You mean my every need? My every whim?
Absolutely.
Because I can be whimsical.
-Nice equipment. -Excuse me?
The computers.
-Can you hack into any computer? -Yes.
So it shouldn't be too hard to raise the credit limit on my Neimans account.
translation.es: Podrías aumentar el límite de mi crédito en Neiman Marcus.

translation.en: Marjorie is here to help us get ready, starting with manicures and pedicures.
translation.es: Marjorie nos ayudará, empezando con manicuras y pedicuras.

translation.en: And then, when we land, we'll find something to wear.
-James. -Hi.
Every kind of game imaginable is stacked over here. It's my dad's private collection.

translation.en: You can sit down.
I hope this isn't too much.
translation.es: Espero que esto no sea demasiado.

translation.en: -Where are we going? -It's a surprise.
This is fine. Thank you.
-Can I get you something? -Is this country great or what?
-Hi, Vera. -Hi.
-Thank you for doing this on short notice. -I'm thrilled to do it. Come with me, ladies.
translation.es: -Gracias por hacerlo con tan corto aviso. -Estoy encantada. Vengan conmigo.

translation.en: -Just a moment, please, ma'am. -James.
I have a feeling you're gonna look great in a tux.
translation.es: Me parece que vas a lucir guapísimo con esmoquin.

translation.en: Samantha! Samantha! Just one picture, Sam.
-Sorry we're late. -Don't be.
Sam, who's your date?
Who are you wearing?
-Sam, how about a kiss? -Sam, just a second. Over here!
translation.es: -Sam, ¿qué tal un besito? -Sam, un segundo. ¡Por aquí!

translation.en: -I was right. -Talk to us for just a second.
It's beautiful.
-Mia and James. -Got you. Hey, baby.
-How you doing? -Good. Hey, Mom.
Beautiful. I'm glad you're here.

translation.es: Señor Presidente y señora, Mia Thompson.

translation.en: -The one in the thong. -Hey, Mia.
Hi.
-Mia, would you like a photo? -Oh, yeah.
-Thanks. -Dad.
-This is James Lamson, my RA and my-- -Mr. President. It's a pleasure to meet you.
translation.es: Él es James Lamson, mi consejero y mi... Señor Presidente. Encantado de conocerlo.

translation.en: -Pleasure to meet you, James. -And my mother.
-Mrs. Mackenzie. You're lovelier in person. -Please. Call me Melanie.
translation.es: -Es más guapa aún en persona. -Por favor, llámame Melanie.

translation.en: Sir, John Armstrong has arrived.
-Yeah. Excuse me. -Right this way, sir.
-Mia. You look lovely tonight. -Hi. Thanks.
We have you seated with very nice people.
translation.es: Te sentamos con gente muy agradable.

translation.en: Important, I hope.
Can we go talk somewhere?
translation.es: Sam, ¿podemos ir a hablar en alguna parte?

translation.en: Sure.
Oh, my goodness. She's beautiful.
-Place your hand-- -What are you doing?
-I'm dancing with you. -No one else is dancing.
And isn't it a shame?
-Here. At my waist. -I need a minute alone with you.
translation.es: -Aquí. En mi cintura. -Necesito un minuto a solas contigo.

translation.en: And I need your left hand.
translation.es: Y yo necesito tu mano izquierda.

translation.en: -We shouldn't do this. -Why not?
It's a free country. I don't care what he says.
translation.es: Es un país libre. No me importa lo que él diga.

translation.en: Call out the National Guard.
translation.es: Que llame a la Guardia Nacional.

translation.en: Nothing is stopping me from dancing with you tonight.
translation.es: Nada me impedirá que baile contigo esta noche.

translation.en: Tonight I am making my own itinerary and it happens to feel great.
translation.es: Esta noche hago mi propio itinerario, y se siente maravilloso.

translation.en: -Sam, I-- -Go away.
Okay. Never mind.
-I'm gonna spin now. -Sam.
We're here to have fun and have a few laughs...
translation.es: Estamos aquí para divertirnos y reírnos...

translation.en: ...and, if I'm lucky, maybe I'll get to dance with my beautiful wife.
translation.es: ...y si tengo suerte, quizá logre bailar con mi hermosa esposa.

translation.en: -What do you think, Mel? -You are so lucky.
Have a good time tonight.
Hey, Sam.
Is Vanuatu really a country? Because this boy told me he's the ambassador.
translation.es: ¿Vanuatu es realmente un país? Este chico me dijo que él es el embajador.

translation.en: You are as beautiful as my country.
translation.es: Eres tan hermosa como mi país.

translation.en: -Samantha, a few questions. This way. -Samantha.
What do you feel about your father's domestic policy? How does it affect you?

translation.en: Is your education hurt by it?
My father's administration gives a great deal of attention to...
translation.es: Mi padre brinda muchísima atención a...

translation.en: You know he's a fraud.
translation.es: Sabes que él es un fraude.

translation.en: Take his college tuition tax exemption initiative.
translation.es: Su iniciativa para exención impositiva sobre aranceles...

translation.en: -Your dad's a fraud. -Yeah, your dad's a fraud.
translation.es: -Tu papá es un fraude. -Sí, tu papá es un fraude.

translation.en: -Hey, back off. -Home comes first!
translation.es: -Déjenla en paz. -¡Lo primero es el país!

translation.en: There are a lot of protesters here. Have you talked to any of these people?

translation.en: -Keep rolling. Stay with the shot. -Lucky Charm on her way.
translation.es: -Sigue filmando. Quédate con la toma. -¡Amuleto de la Suerte en camino!

translation.en: Stay with me!
-What about Mia? -They'll take care of her.
Go! Go!
Lucky Charm is at location six.

translation.en: Roger that. We're taking her home.
Lucky Charm secure.
translation.es: Amuleto de la Suerte a salvo.

translation.en: -You okay? -Don't.
Was there anybody who didn't know except for me? I feel so humiliated.
translation.es: ¿Alguien más no lo sabía, aparte de mí? ¡Me siento tan humillada!

translation.en: Do you know that every day I get, at least...
translation.es: ¿Sabes que todos los días recibo por lo menos...

translation.en: ...a half a dozen threats against you? Every day.
As your father, I couldn't live with myself if something ever happened to you.
translation.es: Como tu padre, no podría seguir viviendo si algo te sucediera.

translation.en: As president...
...this country can't afford to have anything happen to you right now.
translation.es: …este país no puede permitir que algo malo te suceda ahora.

translation.en: What could I do, Sam?
What choice did I have?
You had the choice to be honest with me.
translation.es: Tenías la alternativa de ser honesto conmigo.

translation.en: You had the choice not to lie to me, as my father and as the president.
translation.es: Tenías la alternativa de no mentirme como mi padre y como el presidente.

translation.en: Oh, man.
Hon, I know you thought he was your friend.
translation.es: Querida, sé que pensaste que él era tu amigo.

translation.en: If you want...
...we can replace him.
Won't he lose his job?
He'll be transferred from first family detail...

translation.en: ...but no. He'll find another position.
But not the right position.
He's in line to work for me.
And, yeah, that's where most agents wanna end up.
translation.es: Y, sí, es donde los agentes quieren terminar.

translation.en: No, he can stay.
I really hope someday you understand this.
translation.es: Espero que algún día entiendas esto.

translation.en: I do.
That is what is so disappointing.
translation.es: Eso es lo que más me decepciona.

translation.en: I thought I finally found someone who'd like me for me.
translation.es: Creí que por fin había encontrado a alguien que me quería por mí misma.

translation.en: So how do you know his feelings for you aren't real?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabes que sus sentimientos no eran reales?

translation.en: He was just doing his job.
translation.es: Él solo estaba haciendo su trabajo.

translation.en: That's crap. He wanted you. Watch.
translation.es: Eso es mentira. Te deseaba a ti. Observa.

translation.en: Go back and act like nothing happened.
translation.es: Regresa y actúa como si nada hubiese ocurrido.

translation.en: Or date somebody. There's nothing a man wants more than something he can't have.
translation.es: Mejor sal con alguien. Lo que más quiere un hombre es lo que no puede tener.

translation.en: -Hey, there's Samantha. Samantha! -Hey, Sam.
I just wanted to thank you. I crossed a line...

translation.en: ...and you could have had me fired for that...
...and I just wanted to say that I appreciate it.
translation.es: Quería decirte que te lo agradezco.

translation.en: Hey, Sam.
Sam, I'm really sorry that I had to deceive you.
translation.es: Lamento muchísimo haber tenido que engañarte.

translation.en: We're all living Pinocchios, right?
STUDENT HEALTH CENTER
I'm here for my birth control appointment.
translation.es: Vine para mi cita sobre anticonceptivos.

translation.en: -Miss Mackenzie? -Yes.
So if I could just have as many samples as possible, that'd be great.
translation.es: Me gustaría llevarme la mayor cantidad de muestras posible.

translation.en: It's not really for me.
-I'm trying to make this guy jealous. -Of course.
-No, seriously. -No problem.
I want him to think that there's a lot of action going on.

translation.en: More action. More like spring break in Daytona kind of action.

translation.en: Oh, okay.
Okay, how do you make a tissue dance?

Okay.
I'm beginning to regret the outfit choice. Who was I kidding? I can't pull this off.

translation.en: Is it even working?
You got yourself into this and you're gonna follow through.

translation.en: -Ladies, looking good. -You're right.
What's up?

-What's his name again? -Frank.
Can I speak frankly, Frank?
The life of the college student...
...is really growing on me.
-Furthermore, you're really growing on me. -Thanks.
translation.es: Es más, tú realmente me estás gustando. Gracias.

translation.en: -Bock from Lamson. She's wasted. -Is my date a babe or what?
translation.es: -Bock de Lamson. Ella está borracha. -¿No es guapísimo mi amigo?

translation.en: Yeah, I guess so.
We're federal agents. This is illegal.
Be advised, it's my responsibility.
translation.es: Te comunico que es mi responsabilidad.

translation.en: Let's cut the chatter.
We're moving.
Check it out.
Oh, yeah!
Bring it on down here to Papa, honey.
Oh, come on.
I am so in love with you right now.

translation.en: Bock, do something. This is too much.
translation.es: Bock, haz algo. Esto es demasiado.

translation.en: Hey, it's not our place to get personally involved.
Sam. Sam, get down. This is stupid.
translation.es: Sam. Sam, baja ya. Esto es una estupidez.

translation.en: Yeah!
Sam, what are you doing?
Sam, stop it. Come on. Get down.
Do you like that? Do you like that?
Put me down, James. I'm not 4 years old, James.

translation.en: Put me down. I can walk.
The thing is, you can't, so why don't you let me help you?
translation.es: No, no puedes. Así que, ¿por qué no dejas que te ayude?

translation.en: Why should I trust you?
You lied to me. You made me like you. Why are you a secret service agent?
translation.es: Me mentiste. Hiciste que me gustaras. ¿Por qué eres un agente secreto?

translation.en: Honestly, I'm just trying to get through this and do my job.
translation.es: En este momento, solo trato de superar esto y hacer mi trabajo.

translation.en: Which, by the way, you're making difficult.
translation.es: El cual tú me estás dificultando.

translation.en: Really?
Why are you doing this, Sam?
This isn't you.
This is me, James. Me without you.
translation.es: Así soy yo, James. Yo sin ti.

translation.en: -What was that? -I was just saying good night.
translation.es: -¿Qué fue eso? -Un beso de buenas noches.

translation.en: -What is this? Some kind of game to you? -No.
-You don't have to pretend any more. -You're an amazing girl.
translation.es: -Ya no tienes que fingir. -Eres una chica increíble.

translation.en: Would you stop it? Just stop lying to me.
What could I have given you? I don't have anything. You're the president's daughter.
translation.es: ¿Qué podría haberte dado? No tengo nada que ofrecer. Eres la hija del presidente.

translation.en: I've spent almost my entire life...
translation.es: Me he pasado casi toda mi vida…

translation.en: ...with people smiling at me, and laughing at my jokes...
translation.es: …con gente que se sonríe y ríe de mis chistes...

translation.en: ...and telling me how special I am and how great I am...
translation.es: ...y que me dice lo especial que soy, lo maravillosa que soy…

translation.en: ...and how nice and smart.
And right now I don't know if any of that was true.
translation.es: En este momento, no sé si algo de eso era verdad.

translation.en: Maybe it was all some kind of an act.
I don't know.
What if I was different?
What if I was just like everybody else, James?
translation.es: ¿Y si yo fuera como todos los demás, James?

translation.en: How would you feel about me then?
You just don't get it. Things aren't different.
translation.es: No lo entiendes. Nada es diferente.

translation.en: What if they were?
I think you owe me at least this.
translation.es: Creo que me debes por lo menos esto.

translation.en: Forget image...
...forget politics, forget--
Forget everything else but who I am right now, in here.
translation.es: Olvida todo lo demás, excepto quién soy ahora mismo aquí.

translation.en: If things were different.
If things were different...
...I'd still follow you around all the time.
translation.es: …igual yo te seguiría a todas partes.

translation.en: Because I wanted to...
...not because I had to.
Good night, Sam.
She's not up yet.

translation.en: If you know the name of the movie you'd like to watch, stay on the line.
translation.es: Si sabe el nombre de la película que desea ver, quédese en la línea.

translation.en: -Sorry about all the calls. -Don't worry about it.
You know, you are quite the photogenic young lady.
I would kill for your ass.
And Frankie likes it a lot.
translation.es: Y a Frankie le gusta mucho.

translation.en: Take a number, buddy.
Hey, Liz.
You're gonna have to take this one.
Hi.
Sam, your father is extremely disappointed.
translation.es: Sam, tu padre está sumamente decepcionado.

translation.en: -Is there anything else we need to know? -It was just one night, Liz.
translation.es: -¿Hay algo más que deberíamos saber? -Fue solo una noche, Liz.

translation.en: -One very bad night. -I don't wanna know about your night.
translation.es: -Una muy mala noche. -No me cuentes sobre tu noche.

translation.en: I wanna know about your boyfriend.
What are you talking about? Just put him on.
She wants to talk to you.
I don't wanna talk to her. She went too far.
translation.es: No quiero hablarle. Se pasó de la raya.

translation.en: -Send in the media rep. -Yes, sir.
-He doesn't wanna talk to you, Sam. -He's there now, isn't he? I can hear him.
translation.es: -No quiere hablar contigo. -Está ahí, ¿verdad? Puedo oírlo.

translation.en: -Really, he doesn't. Bye. -I think he's got some good ideas.
translation.es: -De verdad, no quiere hablar. Adiós. -Creo que él tiene algunas buenas ideas.

translation.en: SAM'S "SECRET" ROMANCE
-Who are you? -I'm Agent Dryer, ma'am.
Mr. Lamson is no longer on this detail.
translation.es: El señor Lamson ya no tiene esta responsabilidad.

translation.en: So what does it mean?
Anyone?
Anyone?
At the end of the day, the prince is what?
translation.es: A fin de cuentas, el príncipe es… ¿Qué?

translation.en: Just a prince.
Go on.
It didn't matter how much he trusted...
...or gave of himself or his possessions.
translation.es: …o brindó de sí mismo, o dio de sus posesiones.

translation.en: At the end of the day, the prince is, and will always be...
translation.es: A fin de cuentas, el príncipe es y siempre será…

translation.en: ...just a prince.
He'll always be different.
After Samantha's table dance last night...
translation.es: Después de baile en la mesa de Samantha anoche...

translation.en: ...a shroud of embarrassment surrounds the White House.
Let's go live to Jeff as he tells us about her alleged affair.
translation.es: Jeff Michael nos dirá más sobre su supuesto amorío.

translation.en: The White House has no comment...
translation.es: La Casa Blanca no tiene comentarios...

translation.en: ...regarding a jealous brawl involving Samantha Mackenzie.
translation.es: ...en relación con una pelea de celos y la participación de Samantha Mackenzie.

translation.en: Nor do they have anything to say about her relationship...
translation.es: Ni tampoco sobre su supuesta relación...

translation.en: ...with her secret-service agent.
Reporting live from Redmond University...
translation.es: Reportando en vivo desde la universidad Redmond...

translation.en: What are you doing here?
The question on my mind, Samantha, is what have you been doing here?
translation.es: La pregunta es qué has estado haciendo tú aquí.

translation.en: There's been a three-point drop in the polls since your little table dance.
translation.es: Las encuestas cayeron tres puntos después de tu pequeño baile.

translation.en: Was I that bad?
You've gotta know we are in the race of our lives.
translation.es: Estamos en la carrera de nuestras vidas.

translation.en: We were elected to set an example.
translation.es: Nos eligieron para servir como ejemplo.

translation.en: They expect more of us.
That's the life we've chosen.
translation.es: Esa es la vida que hemos elegido.

translation.en: I didn't choose anything, Mom.
And I didn't run for anything. Nobody elected me, remember?
translation.es: Yo no me presenté como candidata a nada. Nadie me eligió, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: Like it or not, chosen or not...
translation.es: Te guste o no, electa o no…

translation.en: ...you are the daughter of the president of the United States.
translation.es: …eres la hija del presidente de los EE.UU.

translation.en: Your father and I need you. Now.
translation.es: Tu padre y yo te necesitamos. Ahora.

translation.en: We need to be the first family.
You want me to leave school?
When President Harding was elected...
...Florence Harding said, "Warren, I got you the presidency.
translation.es: …Florence Harding dijo: "Warren, te conseguí la presidencia.

translation.en: Now what are you gonna do with it?"
So let's get your father the presidency. Again.
translation.es: Así que consigámosle la presidencia a tu padre. Otra vez.

translation.en: See what he does with it.
translation.es: A ver qué hace con ella.

translation.en: It's his time.
You're asking me to join the campaign.
translation.es: Me pides que me una a la campaña.

translation.en: I'm not asking.
Good evening, Miss.
I guess you heard Samantha, raising money for her dad's re-election...
translation.es: Samantha está reuniendo dinero para reelegir a su papá...

translation.en: ...one dollar at a time.
Yes. That's the big story.
translation.es: Sí, esa es la gran historia.

translation.en: Here's the best part.
The agent who knocked out the guy at the bar where Samantha was stripping?
translation.es: El agente secreto que derribó al sujeto en el bar donde Samantha bailaba…

translation.en: Turns out that secret service agent is her boyfriend.
translation.es: …resultó ser el novio de la joven.

translation.en: With the help of hard-working people like you we can win this thing.
translation.es: Con la ayuda de gente trabajadora como ustedes podemos ganar.

translation.en: Thank you, Motor City.
Mackenzie! Mackenzie! Mackenzie!
Mackenzie! Mackenzie! Mackenzie!
We're here to discuss your proposed removal...
translation.es: Estamos aquí para discutir su propuesta de expulsión...

translation.en: ...as a disciplinary action.
Your record is exceptional, but looking at this report...
translation.es: Sus antecedentes son excepcionales, pero viendo su reporte...

translation.en: ...I have my doubts about your ability to continue as an agent.
translation.es: ...tengo mis dudas sobre su capacidad como agente.

translation.en: I understand.
So please tell this panel why we should allow you to continue as an agent?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿por qué permitirle que siga como agente?

translation.en: My father was an agent and my grandfather was bef--
translation.es: Mi padre y mi abuelo fueron agentes...

translation.en: But they're not the ones under review here. You are.
translation.es: Pero no los cuestionamos a ellos, sino a usted.

translation.en: If you had a different father or grandfather, you wouldn't have this opportunity.
translation.es: Y si tuviera otro padre o abuelo, usted no tendría esta oportunidad.

translation.en: You know, as a little kid...
...I always dreamt about standing on the sidelines of history, protecting others.
translation.es: …soñaba con estar observando la historia, protegiendo a otros.

translation.en: Maybe even the president himself.
Well...
...I had the opportunity to protect a pretty remarkable person.
translation.es: ...tuve la oportunidad de proteger a una persona maravillosa.

translation.en: Do you have anything to say to defend your actions?
translation.es: ¿Tiene algo que decir para defender sus acciones?

translation.en: You trained me to expect the unexpected and I tried not to feel anything.
translation.es: Estoy entrenado para esperar lo inesperado.

translation.en: I tried to keep my distance, but I--
translation.es: Y traté de no sentir nada, pero...

translation.en: Fell deeper.
And deeper.
If having those feelings means losing my job...
translation.es: Y si eso significa perder mi trabajo…

translation.en: ...then that's a loss I am prepared to take.
You and I know that mistakes made in our line of work could mean someone's life.
translation.es: Usted y yo sabemos que nuestros errores pueden costarle la vida a alguien.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You'll be on suspension pending your removal.
And you should start to think about other alternatives.
translation.es: Debería comenzar a considerar otras alternativas.

translation.en: -...his sense of humor, his charisma... -Did we confirm these numbers?
translation.es: -...su sentido del humor, su carisma. -¿Confirmamos esos números?

translation.en: And did she sign for them?
-That's why we chose this venue. -...New Hampshire...
We're not in New Hampshire any more.
translation.es: Ya no estamos en New Hampshire.

translation.en: These people wanna hear about foreign markets.
translation.es: Esta gente espera oír sobre mercado exterior.

translation.en: -Hey. How are you doing? -Good.
You okay?
You're unhappy. I get it.
But if you're gonna be here, be here.
translation.es: Pero si vas a estar aquí, está presente.

translation.en: Because there's a lot at stake and I really need you to act like a grown-up right now.
translation.es: Hay mucho en juego y necesito que actúes como adulta.

translation.en: Obviously I understand there is a lot at stake, Dad.
translation.es: Obviamente entiendo que hay mucho en juego, papá.

translation.en: I have been standing by your side with Mom my entire life.
translation.es: He estado a tu lado, con mamá, toda mi vida.

translation.en: That's why I came home.
You don't have to tell me how important it is to be with the people you love.
translation.es: Sé qué es importante estar con la gente que amas.

translation.en: I am here.
If you want me to be a grown-up then you have to allow it.
translation.es: Si quieres que sea una adulta, entonces tienes que permitírmelo.

translation.en: What's going on with Sam?
What is it?
Remember when she was little...
...she found that frog and we wouldn't let her keep it...
translation.es: ...encontró esa rana y no dejamos que se la quedara…

translation.en: ...and she got that really stubborn little...
-...unbelievably cute look on her face? -Yes.
She just made that face again.
translation.es: Ella acaba de mirarme así otra vez.

translation.en: Man, here I am, about to go on stage...
translation.es: Vaya, aquí estoy, a punto de entrar en escena...

translation.en: ...and she puts her old man in his place.
translation.es: ...y ella pone a su padre en su lugar.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah, really.
And?
And...
-...I don't know. Good for her. -It's time to go, Mr. President.
translation.es: -...bueno. No sé. Me alegro por ella. -Es hora, señor Presidente.

translation.en: Ready?
Let's go.
And as for our president, he'll do to this country what she's done to her family.
translation.es: Y como nuestro presidente, él le hará a este país lo que ella le hizo a su familia.

translation.en: Embarrass it.
We've taken direct hits on the domestic agenda.
-It's the last push before the election. -It's too late to change position.
translation.es: Falta poco para las elecciones. Es demasiado tarde para cambiar de posición.

translation.en: -I don't think we should address it. -What do you think, Sam?
translation.es: -Es mejor no sacar el tema. -¿Qué opinas, Sam?

translation.en: -I don't really have an opinion, Dad. -Really?
translation.es: -En realidad, no tengo una opinión, papá. -¿En serio?

translation.en: Are you sure?
Well....
I don't know what could be more important than home.
translation.es: Yo no sé ¿qué hay más importante que el país?

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the president of the United States.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, el presidente de los EE. UU.

translation.en: Thanks.
-Mr. President. -Afternoon, folks.
Thought you might want a snack.
Made it myself.
Dad.
Okay, I had that cake made myself.
translation.es: Yo mismo pedí que hicieran ese pastel.

translation.en: How are you doing?
-Dad? -Yeah.
I need you to make sure that James is okay.
translation.es: Quiero que te asegures de que James esté bien.

translation.en: He's a good agent.
-I'll see what I can do. -Thank you.
Did you love him?
I loved who I got to be with him.
translation.es: Amé lo que pude ser con él.

translation.en: Even though I didn't do anything amazing...
...for me it was.
I felt like I knew myself for the first time.
translation.es: Sentí como que me conocía por primera vez.

translation.en: Love?
That too.
That's what I thought.
And re-elected to a second term, President John Mackenzie.
translation.es: ¡Y reelecto para un segundo mandato, el presidente John Mackenzie!

translation.en: Thank you very much. God bless the USA.
translation.es: Muchísimas gracias. ¡Dios bendiga a los Estados Unidos!

translation.en: We love you, Mac!
Recently, this really fine young woman...
...pointed out to me the importance of home.
And for the next four years...
translation.es: Y durante los próximos cuatro años…

translation.en: ...this administration is going to find its way back there.
translation.es: …este Gobierno encontrará su camino de regreso a casa…

translation.en: Starting now. Thank you.
It's your time.
-The next dance is for you and me. -Okay.
translation.es: -El próximo baile es para ti y para mí. -De acuerdo.

translation.en: What do you think of your father's policies now?
translation.es: ¿Qué opinas ahora de las políticas de tu padre?

translation.en: I have my own policies to think about.
translation.es: Tengo mis propias políticas en las que pensar.

translation.en: -That was a nice speech. -Thanks.
Dad?
One thing you always taught me was to make sure that I'm always at home...
translation.es: Una cosa que siempre me enseñaste... ...fue que me asegurara de sentirme cómoda…

translation.en: ...no matter what anyone else thinks.
It has to include you.
-We all deserve a second chance. -It's okay.
Give me your left hand.
-What are you doing? -Dancing with you.
On my shoulder.
We shouldn't. We can't.
Try not to lead this time, okay?
translation.es: Trata de no guiar esta vez, ¿sí?

translation.en: ...believe this is yours.
It'll take you on your next trip.
translation.es: Te llevará en tu próximo viaje.

translation.en: Even included the cooler.
We did everything to your exact specifications.
Thank you, James.
Thank you.
Bye, Sam.
Now go try to break a few rules, huh?
You try to keep some.
-Forget something? -Yeah.
I just forgot my purse.
Take good care of him.
I will.
Just getting back on duty now.
I'm just getting off duty now.
I hear she'll be home for spring break.
translation.es: Escuché que regresará para las vacaciones de Pascuas.

translation.en: Just so you know.
You ready to stand on the sidelines of history?
translation.es: ¿Estás listo para permanecer al margen de la historia?

translation.en: Yeah. You?
-POTUS moving. -Yeah.
Just make sure you don't fall in love with this one.
translation.es: Asegúrate de no enamorarte de éste.

translation.en: Once upon a time, underneath the magic of the night sky...
translation.es: Había una vez, bajo la magia del cielo nocturno…

translation.en: ...a brazen little girl grew up in a white house.
translation.es: …una niñita audaz que se crió en una casa blanca.

translation.en: It wasn't until she left that house, however, that she truly found home.
translation.es: Sin embargo, solo cuando dejó esa casa, realmente encontró su hogar.

translation.en: College bound till spring, she'll be back when the cherry blossoms bloom again.
translation.es: Se dirige a la universidad y regresará cuando los cerezos estén en flor.

translation.en: With romance in the air, James will be there.
translation.es: Con romance en el aire, James estará ahí.

translation.en: But that's another story.
